entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: The user aborted a request. when Virtualize cancels the gRPC-Web call (Blazor WASM, net7 regression) #46011
  • Array will allocate less and little faster when creating RequestDelegateFactoryOptions in CreateRDFOptions #46010
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #46005
  • Perf improvement: json #46004
  • CanHaveBody should be false for HTTP/2 CONNECT #46002
  • Unix socket not deleted at startup in Blazor.DevServer #46001
  • `Accept-Ranges` should not be returned when output caching is used #45999
  • Output caching should always vary by Accept-Encoding #45998
  • Centralize logic for template precedence/identity values #45995
    .NET 8 Planning
  • PasswordHasher CompatibilityMode IdentityV2 not working in .NET 6.0 #45994
  • Process terminated with error: Exception thrown from SocketAsyncEngine event loop #45988
  • Styles from library component get lost after hotreload #45987
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Electron will be disconnected frequently when using signlar #45990

Closed

  • SignalR Client Windows Authentication returning 401Unautorized (update 6.0.11 -> 7.0.0) #45371
    8.0-preview1
  • Cannot debug Chrome with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 7.0.2 #45992
    7.0.x
  • SignalR Messagepack serialization issue #45991
  • Command-line build fails on Apple M1 silicon during the `restore.sh` step #40109
  • [Blazor] JS Interop in Blazor MAUI #45912
  • Log message on logout success incorrectly states "Login completed successfully." (Blazor WASM) #45846
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Apreciation for the empty templates that are now offered for blzor #45955
  • Perf regression: json, stage1vanilla #45975
  • Change disposed exceptions to use ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf #43503
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Change argument null exceptions to use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #43482
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] [SignalR] Avoid Http2 when negotiate auth is used #46013
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Call CloseAsync instead of CloseOutputAsync in the browser #46012
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #46009
    3.1.x
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #46007
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #46006
    6.0.x
  • Add throw helpers to more multi-targeted projects #45984
  • Move to latest .NET SDK #45983
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [SignalR] Avoid Http2 when negotiate auth is used #45985
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 8.0-preview1
  • Force update of the npm package with dotnet.d.ts #45997
    blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview1
  • Use dotnet 6 for uploading indexable solution #45996
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Using `JsonTypeInfo` to read request body in RDF #45932
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Make generated code classes file private #46000
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Update templates to 8.0 #45979
    8.0-preview1
  • [blazor][wasm] unify startup bit more #45628
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix logout success log message (Blazor WebAssembly) #45847
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Use dotnet 6 instead of 3.1 for BinLogToSln #45986
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Enable throw helper analyzers #45954
    8.0-preview1
  • Update sourceIndexPackageVersion #45982
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Unskip Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.HttpSys.Microbenchmarks #45981
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime
  • Add Tags property to OutputCache property. #45843
    area-runtime
  • Adding EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Fix DefaultProblemDetailsWriter polymorphism #45906
    area-web-frameworks
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45878
    area-runtime
  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes (#45572) #45591
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2083484 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/Authentication.Msal/src/Interop #45977
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/WebAssembly.Authentication/src/Interop #45978
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
